uts":[{"internalType":"contract TokenGrant","name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"}],"name":"withdraw","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawRevoked","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawToManagedGrantee","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawable","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"The owner of TokenStakingEscrow is TokenStaking contract and only owner can deposit. This contract works with an assumption that operator is unique in the scope of `TokenStaking`, that is, no more than one delegation in the `TokenStaking` can be done do the given operator ever. Even if the previous delegation ended, operator address cannot be reused.","methods":{"availableAmount(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"depositGrantId(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"depositRedelegatedAmount(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"depositWithdrawnAmount(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"depositedAmount(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"getManagedGrantee(address)":{"params":{"managedGrant":"Address of the managed grant contract."}},"hasDeposit(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"migrate(address,address)":{"details":"The receiving escrow needs to accept deposits from this escrow, at least for the period of migration.","params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.","receivingEscrow":"Escrow to which tokens should be migrated."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes)":{"params":{"extraData":"ABI-encoded data containing operator address (32 bytes) and grant ID (32 bytes).","from":"Address depositing tokens - it has to be the address of TokenStaking contract owning TokenStakingEscrow.","token":"The address of KEEP token contract.","value":"The amount of KEEP tokens deposited."}},"redelegate(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Only grantee is allowed to call this function. For managed grant, caller has to be the managed grantee.","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to delegate.","extraData":"Data for stake delegation. This byte array must have the following values concatenated: - Beneficiary address (20 bytes) - Operator address (20 bytes) - Authorizer address (20 bytes)","previousOperator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdraw(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"withdrawRevoked(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"withdrawToManagedGrantee(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}},"withdrawable(address)":{"params":{"operator":"Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited."}}},"title":"TokenStakingEscrow"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"authorizeEscrow(address)":{"notice":"Used by grant manager to authorize another escrows for"},"availableAmount(address)":{"notice":"Returns the currently available amount deposited in the escrow that may or may not be currently withdrawable. The available amount is the amount initially deposited minus the amount withdrawn and redelegated so far from that deposit."},"depositGrantId(address)":{"notice":"Returns grant ID for the amount deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator."},"depositRedelegatedAmount(address)":{"notice":"Returns the total amount redelegated so far from the value deposited in the escrow contract after undelegating it from the provided operator."},"depositWithdrawnAmount(address)":{"notice":"Returns the amount withdrawn so far from the value deposited in the escrow contract after undelegating it from the provided operator."},"depositedAmount(address)":{"notice":"Returns the total amount deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator."},"getManagedGrantee(address)":{"notice":"Resolves the final grantee of ManagedGrant contract. If the provided address is not a ManagedGrant contract, function reverts."},"hasDeposit(address)":{"notice":"Returns true if there is a deposit for the given operator in the escrow. Otherwise, returns false."},"migrate(address,address)":{"notice":"Migrates all available tokens to another authorized escrow. Can be requested only by grantee."},"receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes)":{"notice":"receiveApproval accepts deposits from staking contract and stores them in the escrow by the operator address from which they were undelegated. Function expects operator address and grant identifier to be passed as ABI-encoded information in extraData. Grant with the given identifier has to exist."},"redelegate(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Redelegates deposit or part of the deposit to another operator. Uses the same staking contract as the original delegation."},"withdraw(address)":{"notice":"Withdraws currently unlocked tokens deposited in the escrow after undelegating them from the provided operator. Only grantee or operator can call this function. Important: this function can not be called for a `ManagedGrant` grantee. This may lead to locking tokens. For `ManagedGrant`, please use `withdrawToManagedGrantee` instead."},"withdrawRevoked(address)":{"notice":"Withdraws the entire amount that is still deposited in the escrow in case the grant has been revoked. Anyone can call this function and the entire amount is transferred back to the grant manager."},"withdrawToManagedGrantee(address)":{"notice":"Withdraws currently unlocked tokens deposited in the escrow after undelegating them from the provided operator. Only grantee or operator can call this function. This function works only for `ManagedGrant` grantees. For a standard grant, please use `withdraw` instead."},"withdrawable(address)":{"notice":"Returns the currently withdrawable amount that was previously deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator. Tokens are unlocked based on their grant unlocking schedule. Function returns 0 for non-existing deposits and revoked grants if they have been revoked before they fully unlocked."}},"notice":"Escrow lets the staking contract to deposit undelegated, granted tokens and either withdraw them based on the grant unlocking schedule or re-delegate them to another operator."}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/TokenStakingEscrow.sol":"TokenStakingEscrow"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/Authorizations.sol":{"keccak256":"0x340bb3d18b59fde20dce41ecd5128d891f871a274f8384a89f14754cd293c3cf","urls":["bzz-raw://b9084255d117f6f6307247a0bebc87387a2e5c7a7eec420ff976736ab9417af4","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ7tx4ued84cXNmi7mmvaEAhcpNCWeisiivnbM4aSHeFw"]},"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/GrantStakingPolicy.sol":{"keccak256":"0x433e1f5c70af09ca1b9fac5e602be3ffec7e8e50b34b07f5141bd14e8cca0674","urls":["bzz-raw://d0b4ad0aa3c174856ca32c3ffd7685141873b9549f941894cca8118b5ae99275","dweb:/ipfs/QmdMA1csXSSQHmnsSQs2tmeDJ6zdoKdyD2EneKJfM9VtRj"]},"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/KeepRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbc0e44a838bae38c1d11db28b5bfcfdfd79394d423ce6fd85dcb90a6420e1f10","urls":["bzz-raw://74b140b3a4547cc742785c613e2927bc3592e71f0f42eff5112462a9985083cb","dweb:/ipfs/QmQLsNVWAcgHhtoJAfiXjipYaksfLpcoaa45c2LvRh9hfg"]},"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/KeepToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x42abcd9c9c67d8d83b91a01e42abde3355b3a67fb7c510d7d8b63b5e23d3defe","urls":["bzz-raw://ef26e4ad4042c74e230a343f9e69c2d142b581e4a2c7ee27ec51a1f7e9f91a68","dweb:/ipfs/QmfJ9cEpzj2WQ5upvizC16pthvC2vQP8geFeUATFb4ov2G"]},"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/ManagedGrant.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3f0f6e2107f6154a619b02dbc694c9e3341005dd0879a10e7f105d2a540a1158","urls":["bzz-raw://f6559e8ad8bea87d1d7a1f333935c8e42d7979e2de47f1a34a7cb7121f35f021","dweb:/ipfs/QmSKdVqS9AiEQ2UjtpPGnz3UBgaVA6enGadZHjqsxaSnHj"]},"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/StakeDelegatable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x328b20a9f89222294dd8aaff19097bcbe427e211f7e8006ffb107d5813ce7522","urls":["bzz-raw://65316b2733aa23fac341170a9d668a78ddef663d59c7fa6aa68ad4b1c98c3e03","dweb:/ipfs/QmShjVArh35v93n5erjbZMxHnBcctNS3tkgd1jRqTNWaEA"]},"@keep-network/keep-core/contracts/TokenGrant.sol":{"keccak256": nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the currently withdrawable amount that was previously
 deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator.
 Tokens are unlocked based on their grant unlocking schedule.
 Function returns 0 for non-existing deposits and revoked grants if they
 have been revoked before they fully unlocked.
 @param operator Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled
 delegation from which tokens were deposited.

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraws currently unlocked tokens deposited in the escrow
 after undelegating them from the provided operator. Only grantee or
 operator can call this function. Important: this function can not be
 called for a `ManagedGrant` grantee. This may lead to locking tokens.
 For `ManagedGrant`, please use `withdrawToManagedGrantee` instead.
 @param operator Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled
 delegation from which tokens were deposited.

 delegation from which tokens were deposited.

devdoc.details: The owner of TokenStakingEscrow is TokenStaking contract and only owner can deposit. This contract works with an assumption that operator is unique in the scope of `TokenStaking`, that is, no more than one delegation in the `TokenStaking` can be done do the given operator ever. Even if the previous delegation ended, operator address cannot be reused.

params.operator: Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.

params.managedGrant: Address of the managed grant contract.

params.operator: Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

migrate(address,address).details: The receiving escrow needs to accept deposits from this escrow, at least for the period of migration.

params.operator: Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
params.receivingEscrow: Escrow to which tokens should be migrated.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.extraData: ABI-encoded data containing operator address (32 bytes) and grant ID (32 bytes).
params.from: Address depositing tokens - it has to be the address of TokenStaking contract owning TokenStakingEscrow.
params.token: The address of KEEP token contract.
params.value: The amount of KEEP tokens deposited.

redelegate(address,uint256,bytes).details: Only grantee is allowed to call this function. For managed grant, caller has to be the managed grantee.

params.extraData: Data for stake delegation. This byte array must have the following values concatenated: - Beneficiary address (20 bytes) - Operator address (20 bytes) - Authorizer address (20 bytes)
params.previousOperator: Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.operator: Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.
Address of the operator from the undelegated/canceled delegation from which tokens were deposited.

devdoc.title: TokenStakingEscrow

authorizeEscrow(address).notice: Used by grant manager to authorize another escrows for

availableAmount(address).notice: Returns the currently available amount deposited in the escrow that may or may not be currently withdrawable. The available amount is the amount initially deposited minus the amount withdrawn and redelegated so far from that deposit.

depositGrantId(address).notice: Returns grant ID for the amount deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator.

depositRedelegatedAmount(address).notice: Returns the total amount redelegated so far from the value deposited in the escrow contract after undelegating it from the provided operator.

depositWithdrawnAmount(address).notice: Returns the amount withdrawn so far from the value deposited in the escrow contract after undelegating it from the provided operator.

depositedAmount(address).notice: Returns the total amount deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator.

getManagedGrantee(address).notice: Resolves the final grantee of ManagedGrant contract. If the provided address is not a ManagedGrant contract, function reverts.

hasDeposit(address).notice: Returns true if there is a deposit for the given operator in the escrow. Otherwise, returns false.

migrate(address,address).notice: Migrates all available tokens to another authorized escrow. Can be requested only by grantee.

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,.notice: receiveApproval accepts deposits from staking contract and stores them in the escrow by the operator address from which they were undelegated. Function expects operator address and grant identifier to be passed as ABI-encoded information in extraData. Grant with the given identifier has to exist.

redelegate(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Redelegates deposit or part of the deposit to another operator. Uses the same staking contract as the original delegation.

withdraw(address).notice: Withdraws currently unlocked tokens deposited in the escrow after undelegating them from the provided operator. Only grantee or operator can call this function. Important: this function can not be called for a `ManagedGrant` grantee. This may lead to locking tokens. For `ManagedGrant`, please use `withdrawToManagedGrantee` instead.

withdrawRevoked(address).notice: Withdraws the entire amount that is still deposited in the escrow in case the grant has been revoked. Anyone can call this function and the entire amount is transferred back to the grant manager.

withdrawToManagedGrantee(address).notice: Withdraws currently unlocked tokens deposited in the escrow after undelegating them from the provided operator. Only grantee or operator can call this function. This function works only for `ManagedGrant` grantees. For a standard grant, please use `withdraw` instead.

withdrawable(address).notice: Returns the currently withdrawable amount that was previously deposited in the escrow after undelegating it from the provided operator. Tokens are unlocked based on their grant unlocking schedule. Function returns 0 for non-existing deposits and revoked grants if they have been revoked before they fully unlocked.

userdoc.notice: Escrow lets the staking contract to deposit undelegated, granted tokens and either withdraw them based on the grant unlocking schedule or re-delegate them to another operator.
